trans-unit.source: Transforms XML data using an XSLT style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 轉換使用 XSLT 樣式表的 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The XslCompiledTransform class is an XSLT processor that supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: XslCompiledTransform 類別是支援 XSLT 1.0 語法的 XSLT 處理器。

trans-unit.source: It is a new implementation and includes performance gains when compared to the obsolete <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 它是新的實作，並包括效能提升相較於過時的<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The structure of the XslCompiledTransform class is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: XslCompiledTransform 類別的結構是相似的<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>類別。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method loads and compiles the style sheet, while the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method executes the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法載入並編譯樣式工作表，同時<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法執行 XSLT 轉換。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 支援`document()`函式和內嵌指令碼區塊預設會停用。

trans-unit.source: These features can be enabled by creating an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings> object and passing it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這些功能可以藉由建立啟用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>物件並將其傳遞至<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[移轉從 XslTransform 類別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Security Considerations When creating an application that uses the XslCompiledTransform class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - XSLT scripting is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 安全性考量建立時使用 XslCompiledTransform 類別的應用程式，您應該留意下列項目及其含意:-XSLT 指令碼預設會停用。

trans-unit.source: XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment.
trans-unit.target: 僅當需要指令碼支援且在完全受信任的環境中運作時，才應啟用 XSLT 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: - The XSLT `document()` function is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: -XSLT`document()`函式預設會停用。

trans-unit.source: If you enable the `document()` function, restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您啟用`document()`函式，限制可以藉由傳遞存取的資源<xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>物件<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>

trans-unit.source: - Extension objects are enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 依預設會啟用擴充物件。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> object containing extension objects is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method, they are utilized.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>包含擴充物件的物件會傳遞至<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法，則會加以利用。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>

trans-unit.source: - XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: -XSLT 樣式表可以包含其他檔案及內嵌指令碼區塊的參考。

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources.
trans-unit.target: 惡意使用者可以利用這一點，藉由提供您資料或樣式表執行時可能會導致您的系統處理，直到電腦資源不足。

trans-unit.source: - XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing.
trans-unit.target: 的在混合的信任環境中執行 XSLT 應用程式會導致詐騙的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method and executes the transformation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，惡意使用者可以載入含有害樣式表的物件和遞交給另一個使用者隨後會呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法並執行轉換。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: These security issues can be mitigated by not enabling scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source, and by not accepting XslCompiledTransform objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from an untrusted source.
trans-unit.target: 不啟用指令碼，可減輕這些安全性問題或`document()`函式除非樣式表來自受信任的來源，而且不接受 XslCompiledTransform 物件、 XSLT 樣式表或 XML 來源不受信任來源的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"></xref> class with the specified debug setting.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"></xref>與指定的偵錯設定的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met in order to step into the code and debug the style sheet: - The `enableDebug` parameter is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要逐步執行程式碼和偵錯樣式表，必須符合下列條件:-`enableDebug`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: - The style sheet is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method either as a URI, or an implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: -在樣式表會傳遞至<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法做為 URI 或實作<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>類別可實作<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>介面。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface is implemented on all text-parsing <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>介面實作上所有的文字剖析<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>物件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the style sheet is loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object, such as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> implementation that does not implement the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface, you cannot debug the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果使用載入樣式表<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>物件，例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>實作不會實作<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>介面，您無法偵錯樣式表。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> used to load the style sheet is a file-based <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> (this is the default <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class).
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>用來載入樣式表是以檔案為基礎<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>，例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>(這是預設<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>供<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>類別)。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: - The style sheet is located on the local machine or on the intranet.
trans-unit.target: -在樣式表位於本機電腦上或內部網路上。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to generate debug information; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>產生偵錯資訊;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> enables you to debug the style sheet with the Microsoft Visual Studio Debugger.
trans-unit.target: 將此設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>可讓您偵錯樣式表使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 偵錯工具。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an XSLT style sheet to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 會編譯 XSLT 樣式表指定的型別。

trans-unit.source: The `xsltc.exe` tool is a wrapper around the CompileToType method.
trans-unit.target: `xsltc.exe`工具是 CompileToType 方法的包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Compiling style sheets with the `xsltc.exe` will meet the demands of most applications that leverage the use of compiled style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 編譯樣式表與`xsltc.exe`會滿足大部分的應用程式，運用使用編譯的樣式表的需求。

trans-unit.source: The CompileToType method should be used when building custom compilation tools.
trans-unit.target: 建立自訂的編譯工具時，應該使用 CompileToType 方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> positioned at the beginning of the style sheet to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>位於要編譯的樣式表的開頭。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> to be applied to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref>来套用的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default*> will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>、<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default*>將會套用。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> use to resolve style sheet modules referenced in <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:import" name="xsl:import" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:include" name="xsl:include" href=""></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>使用解析參考中的樣式表模組<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:import" name="xsl:import" href=""></xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:include" name="xsl:include" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, external resources will not be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，將不會解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> enables debugging the style sheet with a debugger.
trans-unit.target: 將此設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>啟用偵錯工具偵錯樣式表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> used for the style sheet compilation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>用於編譯樣式表。</xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The provided TypeBuilder is used to generate the resulting type.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的 TypeBuilder 用於產生結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The base path for the assemblies generated for <xref uid="langword_csharp_msxsl:script" name="msxsl:script" href=""></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 針對產生的組件的基底路徑<xref uid="langword_csharp_msxsl:script" name="msxsl:script" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: If only one script assembly is generated, this parameter specifies the path for that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果只產生一個指令碼組件，這個參數會指定該組件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple script assemblies, a distinctive suffix will be appended to the file name to ensure uniqueness of assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個指令碼組件，相異後置字元將會附加至檔案名稱，以便確保組件名稱的唯一性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> object containing compiler errors and warnings that indicate the results of the compilation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含編譯器錯誤和警告，指出編譯的結果。

trans-unit.source: Loads and compiles the style sheet located at the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 載入並編譯位於指定之 URI 的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>類別支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 樣式表必須使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to resolve the style sheet URI, and process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法具有下列行為:-<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>沒有使用者認證用來解析樣式表的 URI，並處理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with default settings is used to load the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>預設設定用來載入樣式表。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: DTD processing is disabled on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>上停用 DTD 處理

trans-unit.source: If you require DTD processing, create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with this feature enabled, and pass it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要 DTD 處理，請建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>這項功能已啟用，並將它傳遞給<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The `document()` function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: -`document()`函式會停用。

trans-unit.source: - Embedded scripts are not supported.
trans-unit.target: -不支援內嵌指令碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29> overload to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>多載來指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>必要的驗證認證，或指定不同的 XSLT 設定。</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 樣式表的 URI。

trans-unit.target: The stylesheetUri value is .

trans-unit.target: 樣式表包含錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到樣式表。

trans-unit.source: The stylesheetUri value includes a filename or directory that cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: stylesheetUri 值包含檔案名稱或找不到的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The stylesheetUri value cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: stylesheetUri 值無法解析。

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred while processing the request.
trans-unit.target: -或者-處理要求時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: stylesheetUri不是有效的 URI。

trans-unit.source: There was a parsing error loading the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 發生剖析錯誤載入樣式表。

trans-unit.source: Loads the compiled style sheet that was created using the [XSLT Compiler (xsltc.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 載入使用建立的已編譯的樣式表[XSLT 編譯器 (xsltc.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The xsltc.exe tool is used to compile style sheets and generate assemblies from the style sheets.
trans-unit.target: Xsltc.exe 工具會用來編譯樣式表，並從樣式表產生組件。

trans-unit.source: The Load method loads the compiled style sheet from the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Load 方法會從組件載入編譯的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must also include the XSLT assembly as a reference in your application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中您的應用程式必須也包含 XSLT 組件做為參考。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class that contains the compiled style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 包含已編譯的樣式表的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is usually the name of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是樣式表的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified, the xsltc.exe tool uses the name of the style sheet for the class and assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 除非另外指定，否則 xsltc.exe 工具會樣式表名稱的類別和組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the style sheet contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 編譯<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>中所包含的樣式表

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>類別支援 XSLT 1.0 語法。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 樣式表必須使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet loads from the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> through all its children.
trans-unit.target: 從目前節點載入樣式表<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>透過所有子系。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您使用做為樣式表的文件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: After the Load method completes, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Load 方法完成之後，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>位於樣式表結尾之後的下一個節點。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the end of the document is reached, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned at the end of file (EOF).
trans-unit.target: 如果到達文件結尾，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>會定位於檔案結尾 (EOF)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法具有下列行為:-<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>沒有使用者認證用來處理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: - The `document()` function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: -`document()`函式會停用。

trans-unit.source: - Embedded scripts are not supported.
trans-unit.target: -不支援內嵌指令碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29> overload to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>中實作介面<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>類別。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別代表 XML 資料的記憶體中快取。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>類別以 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 上，並包含編輯功能。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>類別是以 XPath 資料模型為基礎的唯讀資料存放區。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>XSLT 建議的類別處理。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: 它提供更快的效能相較於<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>類別。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 轉換是整個套用至文件。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立只包含節點片段，物件，並將該物件傳遞至轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 轉換節點片段](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>中實作介面<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>類別。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別代表 XML 資料的記憶體中快取。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>類別以 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 上，並包含編輯功能。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>類別是以 XPath 資料模型為基礎的唯讀資料存放區。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>XSLT 建議的類別處理。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: 它提供更快的效能相較於<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>類別。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 轉換是整個套用至文件。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立只包含節點片段，物件，並將該物件傳遞至轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 轉換節點片段](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> (typically an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>), or an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> containing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft.NET Framework 中，這可以是<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> (通常<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>)，或<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref>包含要轉換的資料。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> containing the namespace-qualified arguments used as input to the transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref>包含做為轉換輸入的命名空間限定引數。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>至您想要輸出。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The input or results value is .
trans-unit.target: The input or results value is .

trans-unit.source: There was an error executing the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: 執行 XSLT 轉換時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Executes the transform using the input document specified by the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref> object and outputs the results to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 使用所指定的輸入文件執行轉換<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref>物件，並將結果輸出至<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> provides additional run-time arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref>提供額外的執行階段引數。

trans-unit.source: If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XSLT`document()`啟用函式時，就會解析使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>不具使用者認證。</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果在需要驗證的網路資源位於外部的資源，請使用接受的多載<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>做為其中一個引數，並指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>具有必要認證。</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: This method does not support the `xsl:strip-space` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不支援`xsl:strip-space`項目。

trans-unit.source: If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> overload which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as the input argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的已編譯的樣式表包含`xsl:strip-space`項目，您必須使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>多載，這個方法會接受<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>做為輸入的引數。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>中實作介面<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>類別。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別代表 XML 資料的記憶體中快取。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>類別以 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 上，並包含編輯功能。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>類別是以 XPath 資料模型為基礎的唯讀資料存放區。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>XSLT 建議的類別處理。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: 它提供更快的效能相較於<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>類別。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 轉換是整個套用至文件。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果您要傳入的節點不是文件根節點，則不會阻止轉換程序取得已載入文件中的所有節點。

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: 若要轉換節點片段，您必須建立只包含節點片段，物件，並將該物件傳遞至轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 轉換節點片段](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>至您想要輸出。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains an `xsl:output` element, you should create the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object returned from the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings*> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果樣式表包含`xsl:output`項目，您應該建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>從傳回的物件<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings*>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings*> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> has the correct output settings.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>具有正確的輸出設定。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>
